translations.chinese: 秋七月乙亥，未央宮凌室災；
translations.english: In autumn, seventh month, on the day yihai, Weiyang Palace's ice room suffered disaster.
On the day bingzi, the weaving room suffered disaster.
In the fifth year, winter, tenth month, it frosted.
Peach and plum trees flowered, dates bore fruit.

translations.chinese: 春正月，復發長安六百里內男女十四萬五千人城長安，三十日罷。
translations.english: In spring, first month, he again mobilized 145,000 men and women within six hundred li of Chang'an to wall Chang'an. After thirty days they stopped.
